short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Improve your language without slowing down your reading.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Ries is different from other translators.
We designed it for people who want to learn a language, not just translate.

Why traditional translation tools don't help you learn:
❌ They translate everything into your native language
❌ You keep relying on translations
❌ They only work with foreign content, but 80% of your daily reading is still in your native language
❌ Your language skills don't improve, even after reading foreign content for a long time
❌ Even with bilingual translation, you'll focus on your native language

How Ries helps you learn while reading:
✅ We use AI to understand which words you already know
✅ We only translate the words you haven't mastered yet
✅ You can read smoothly while learning new words
✅ Your language skills improve naturally

🎉 But that's not all!
When you read in your native language, Ries does something special:
- We add in words you're learning
- This creates more chances to practice
- You learn even while reading familiar content

🚀 And we're going beyond just reading:
- Watch YouTube videos with smart language enhancement
- Enjoy Netflix while learning naturally
- More entertainment platforms coming soon

💪 Plus, powerful learning features:
- Track your language growth with detailed knowledge maps
- Understand your vocabulary mastery level in real-time
- Strengthen your weak points with targeted practice
- See your progress across different content types

🌈 Ries turns every website into your easy language learning environment.
⏰ No extra study time is needed.
🎓 Just enjoy your daily content, and watch your language skills grow.
